entity.name: UK coronavirus death toll has passed 15,000
Highlights from UK government press conference on schools and PPE

text: A study of Covid-19 patients in American veterans’ hospitals suggests anti-malarial drugs can’t beat the virus: those treated with hydroxychloroquine died at a greater rate than those not given the drug. President Trump has promoted it. His public-health agency did not.
